alert.note: Alert for Marion; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of NORTH CENTRAL and SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, in NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Washington KY. In SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Marion. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lebanon, Springfield, Loretto, Raywick, Saint Mary, Burkes Spring, Nerinx, Saint Francis, Dant and Jimtown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
